name: Ruined (PhilXIVII)
description:
This is a game I made at Southampton Global Game Jam 2018, Using the latest version of Unity. All artwork was created by Adam Barton. 

In it's current state the credits page and instructions page are blank. The controls are as follows:

w: jump

a and d: left and right

The player creates smoke behind him/her, which can be used to stand on (the smoke dissipates over time, at which point you will fall). Use the smoke to help yourself to the top of the level. Avoid touching enemies and watch out for projectiles.
